page.title: 02AUSTIN ROVER 1
page.content: The Austin Rover factory occupies l00 hectares of land and employs l2,300 people. 8,900 are hourly-paid and 3,400 are staff employees. The hourly-paid employees are engaged in engineering and toolmaking; the staff employees are engaged in engineering and commercial activities. l08 workers were interviewed to find out what they thought about working at Cowley. 8 had been working there for more than 30 years, l5 for between l5 and 30 years, 37 for between 10 and 20 years and 48 for less than l0 years.
